t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Not at all. The dents happen in shipping. You have to remember that you're ordering flats of *lots of heavy cans* and there's no real way to pad them reliably. Amazon uses air bladders which don't all the time work for cans. I usually count on three to four cans of catfood busted open per order.

s: June 26, 2024 - It's hard to see but the can isn't sealed anymore around the dent. In general you shouldn't eat food from dented cans whether the puncture is visible or not.
